mapper.insert: insert into com_cust_warranty( `pro_policy_no`,`warranty_code`,`warranty_uuid`,`company_id`,`user_id`,`user_type`,`agent_id`,`ditch_id`,`plan_id`, `product_id`,`premium`,`start_time`,`end_time`,`ins_company_id`,`count`,`pay_time`,`pay_way`,`by_stages_way`,`is_settlement`, `warranty_url`,`warranty_from`,`type`,`check_status`,`pay_status`,`warranty_status`,`created_at`,`updated_at`,`state` ) select #{pro_policy_no},#{warranty_code},#{warranty_uuid},#{company_id},#{user_id},#{user_type},#{agent_id},#{ditch_id},#{plan_id}, #{product_id},#{premium},#{start_time},#{end_time},#{ins_company_id},#{count},#{pay_time},#{pay_way},#{by_stages_way},#{is_settlement}, #{warranty_url},#{warranty_from},#{type},#{check_status},#{pay_status},#{warranty_status},#{created_at},#{updated_at},#{state} from dual where not exists( select w.id from com_cust_warranty w left join com_cust_warranty_person p on w.warranty_uuid = p.warranty_uuid where w.`start_time` <= #{end_time} and w.`end_time` >#{start_time} and `warranty_status`!=6 and p.card_code=#{search_card_code} limit 1 )
mapper.select: select w.id,w.warranty_uuid from com_cust_warranty w left join com_cust_warranty_person p on w.warranty_uuid = p.warranty_uuid where w.`start_time` <= #{end_time} and w.`end_time` >#{start_time} and `warranty_status`!=6 and p.card_code=#{search_card_code} limit 1
